item.title: Trump’s ‘drill, baby, drill’ pledge may be a win-win for drivers and oil producers alike
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump’s pro-energy policies don’t seem all that supportive for the oil market — at first glance.

item.title: Why the stock market’s ‘Trump bump’ could become a ‘Trump dump’
item.description: Are you sure you know more about the stock market than Warren Buffett?

item.title: It’s not just election betting: Why one expert thinks prediction markets will become bigger than stocks
item.description: Event contracts give markets a way to price in an uncertain future, says Interactive Brokers founder Thomas Peterffy.

item.title: I was invited to join a VIP investment club. It promoted bitcoin and other crypto — that’s when the trouble started.
item.description: “The people in charge, I realize now, somehow managed to manipulate a small-cap stock so the members made profits.”

item.title: ‘I’m 38 and completely broke’: I earn $50,000 a year. What professional degree will guarantee me six figures?
item.description: “I am willing to put in an extra 1 to 4 years of schooling and use student loans to pay for it.”
